personal.name: Mauricio Benavides
personal.title: Engineering Lead | DevOps Engineer
personal.tagline: Building and scaling resilient cloud infrastructure and leading high-performing engineering teams.

about.summary: Passionate engineering leader with deep expertise in cloud infrastructure, DevOps practices, and team management. Specialized in helping organizations build the future using Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Docker, and Infrastructure as Code. Experienced in designing scalable cloud architectures, implementing secure CI/CD pipelines, and mentoring engineering teams to deliver exceptional results.

experience.description: Leading engineering teams and driving DevOps transformation across multiple client engagements.
highlights: Provided technical leadership and strategic vision for engineering practices
Managed and mentored engineering teams including performance reviews and career coaching
Designed and implemented scalable cloud architectures on Azure and GCP
Built and maintained secure CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, and Jenkins
Implemented Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and Kubernetes

experience.description: Managed key client accounts and provided technical sales consulting for cloud solutions.
highlights: Led technical sales consulting for enterprise cloud migration projects
Managed strategic client accounts and drove revenue growth
Provided pre-sales technical guidance for cloud platform adoption

experience.description: Consulted on cloud product strategy and helped clients adopt cloud-native solutions.
highlights: Advised clients on cloud product selection and architecture design
Supported digital transformation initiatives with cloud-first strategies
Delivered technical workshops and training sessions
